exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros P H n m Hnm.
intros P H n m Hnm.
exceptions.exn: In environment P : nat -> Prop H : forall n : nat, (forall m : nat, m < n -> P m) -> P n m, m0 : nat Hnm : m <= m0 IHHnm : P m m0' : nat Hlt : m0' < m Unable to unify "P m" with "P m0'".

ctx: intros P H n m Hnm.
exceptions.exn: In environment P : nat -> Prop H : forall n : nat, (forall m : nat, m < n -> P m) -> P n m, m0 : nat Hnm : m <= m0 IHHnm : P m m0' : nat Hlt : m0' < m Unable to unify "?M1879 <= m0" with "P m0'".

original: intros P H n m Hnm. induction Hnm. - apply H. intros m Hlt. inversion Hlt. - apply H; intros m0 Hlt. apply IHHnm. apply Nat.lt_le_incl with (m := m0). auto.
